name: Neumont LMS Update 2013
description: This style updates the Neumont LMS to match Neumont's new branding. It includes their new 2013 logo and their newer color scheme. This style affects every page.
additional_info:
Version 1.0

This stylesheet affects the new Neumont LMS and adds the new Neumont logo and colors.

Version 1.1

Added a tweak to the discussions page that hides the useless blue "0" that appears when you have no unread messages. If there are unread messages, the blue number will appear. This tweak makes it much easier to tell which discussions have unread replies.
